attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for terrorism offences
attributes.additional_details: We have seen people killed in Manchester , in Westminster we have seen people knifed to death on the streets (Lee Rigby) we have seen people killed  by vehicle attacks and this is a never ending story which must stop
attributes.background: Our country is suffering at the hands of the extremists and fanatics and our laws cannot stop them - we need a deterrent in place to make these people think twice before committing their atrocities in the UK
